data.ahort: at sword or polearm point; approximately 1 to 5 meters.
data.medium: at pistol range; from 6 to 50 meters.
data.long: at rifle range; from 51 to 250 meters.
data.very long: at extreme range; from 251 to 500 meters.
data.distant: beyond normal contact; from 500 to 5000 meters.
data.very distant: out of sight; from 5 to 50 kilometers.
